channel.title: Files stopping me from copying
channel.description: Every 2 days I make a copy of everyones chars just incase theirs reset somehow but I cant copy anymroe theres unknown files in there :( they are called "ahrim" , "dharok" and others how do I get rid of them? wont let me delete even when the server is offline :|

item.title: Files stopping me from copying
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

maybe you need to run a error check on your hard drive
goto commandprompt nand type chkdsk c: /f

it will tell you to restart, do what it says.

Then try to delete the “unmovable” files

Read full topic
